RootLayout.description: BizOps ERP - Integrated Business Operating System

Homepage.hero_description: Ditch the fragmented spreadsheets. BizOps unifies HR, Finance, and Supply Chain into one secure, fast, and scalable platform.

CounterForm.error_increment_range: Please enter a number between 1 and 10

Hello.alternative_message: Check out the <url>Pro SaaS Starter Kit</url> for more features!

automation_ai.title: Let the System Work, Not You.
automation_ai.description: Reduce repetitive and boring manual work by up to 80%. BizOps is equipped with Automation engine (Workflow Builder) and practical Artificial Intelligence (Applied AI) to make your business run on autopilot.

analytics.title: Your Reports, Your Way. No Coding.
analytics.description: Every business has a unique way of viewing data. Don't be stuck with rigid standard reports. With Report Builder, you become the data analyst for your own company.

multi_company.title: One Platform for Your Entire Business Group.
multi_company.description: Have multiple PTs, CVs, or different business units? Don't manage them on separate islands. Unite your corporate group management with a native Multi-Company structure.

portals.title: Stop Being an Admin for Your Clients.
portals.description: Free your CS, Sales Admin, and Purchasing teams from repetitive questions via WhatsApp. Provide 24/7 self-service portal access to your business partners to view the data they need themselves.
